aboutWebText: Hi, this is my personal website. I've made in Vue 3 with TypeScript, and I'm using Vite as the build tool. This site is a showcase of my skills, projects, and interests in development.
aboutMeText: Hello, I'm Giovani, a software engineering student. Currently I'm interning and studying in Minas Gerais, Brazil! I love programming, I'm passionate about web development and I'm always open to contribute in open source projects.
contactInfo: If you want to contact me, you can use the links above, or say something in the field below to send me an email!
checkSocialLinks: Hey, check out my social links!
welcome: Hi, I'm Giovani! Welcome to my website!
